headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Enphase Energy Stock Surges; Equinix Shares Fall
summary: The S&P 500 advanced 0.8% on Thursday, June, 26, ending the session just three points below its record-high closing level.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Enphase Energy Stock Surges; Equinix Shares Fall

headline: Solar stocks climb, Equinix's weak outlook: Trending Tickers
summary: Market Domination host Josh Lipton goes over some of today's trending tickers with Yahoo Finance anchor Julie Hyman and Christine Short, head of corporate event research at Wall Street Horizon. Solar stocks, like Enphase (ENPH), First Solar (FSLR), and SolarEdge (SEDG), surge after there was renewed talk in Congress of restoring clean energy tax credits. Equinix (EQIX) stock slid on the company's weaker-than-expected revenue forecast. The company also announced costly artificial intelligence (AI)–driven expansion plans that analysts say will hurt earnings. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Enphase (ENPH) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of home energy technology company Enphase (NASDAQ:ENPH) jumped 13% in the afternoon session after the solar sector received a boost from indications that U.S. lawmakers are considering preserving tax credits for rooftop solar.

headline: Enphase Energy Leads S&P 500 Gainers on Solar Tax Credit News

headline: Why Enphase Stock Is Soaring Today
summary: The U.S. Senate is reportedly considering retaining clean energy tax credits in the 2026 budget bill.  Enphase and other solar stocks have suffered in recent months on expectations that the tax credits were going away.  Congress apparently is having second thoughts about ending tax credits for rooftop solar.

raw.headline: Why Enphase Stock Is Soaring Today
